Description: Body sherd of East Greek Wild Goat style pottery amphora; outside, white slip, head of dog to right, filling ornaments; inside reserved. Fine micaceous fabric
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: van de Wiel 1968 / Verzameling ceramiek en Terracotta's Archaeologisch Instituut der Rijksuniversiteit Leiden (p. 3, N 7, pl. 1, N 7)
Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 35, no. A. 3a)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.015)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: T.2498 (Musée Scheurleer (The Hague) Registration number)
